title: Chintz Fragments, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants (black, 3 reds, 2 purples) applied by brush, sometimes over resist. Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist (chintz).
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 201.9 x 130.8 cm (6 ft. 7 1/2 in. x 51 1/2 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 21 x 37.5 cm (8 1/4 x 14 3/4 in.)
Warp x Weft (c): 21 x 37.5 cm (8 1/4 x 14 3/4 in.)
Warp x Weft (d): 21.5 x 40 cm (8 7/16 x 15 3/4 in.)
description: Four fragments of a large design of flowering branches on a white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragments, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants (black, 3 reds, 2 purples) applied by brush, sometimes over resist. Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-59-a/d.
